name: Hazelnut Katli

instructions.action: Roast hazelnuts in oven at 175Â°C for 10 minutes, then rub in a towel to remove skins
Grind roasted hazelnuts into a fine powder in food processor
In a heavy-bottomed pan, combine sugar and water, cook until it reaches one-string consistency
Add hazelnut powder to the sugar syrup and mix well
Add ghee and cardamom powder, continue cooking on low heat
Stir continuously until mixture thickens and starts leaving the sides of the pan
Pour onto a greased plate or parchment paper and spread evenly
Let cool for 5-10 minutes, then cut into diamond shapes while still warm
Once completely cool, apply silver leaf if using
Let set for 2 hours before serving

tips: Remove hazelnut skins for smoother texture
Test sugar syrup: drop a small amount in water, should form a single thread
Don't overcook or katli will become hard
Cut while warm for clean edges
Store in airtight container for up to 1 week
Can substitute half the hazelnuts with cashews for variation
